references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the work's use of diffusion models for generating high-quality anomaly repairs.
This paper provides the theoretical underpinning for the diffusion models used in AR-Pro, a core component of the proposed method.
This highly cited survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of anomaly detection techniques, forming the basis for the paper's discussion of existing methods and their limitations.

references.paper_title: Mvtec ad-a comprehensive real-world dataset for unsupervised anomaly detection
references.reason: This paper introduces a widely used benchmark dataset (MVTec AD) for evaluating anomaly detection methods, which is crucial for validating the proposed framework's performance.

references.paper_title: Swat: A water treatment testbed for research and training on ics security
references.reason: This paper introduces the SWaT dataset, another key benchmark used to evaluate AR-Pro on time-series data and demonstrate its applicability across different domains.
